summary: This document is an email chain from August 7, 2019, regarding a request for property deed records for Little St James Island. It includes an attached deed from 2011 showing the transfer of the island from L.S.I. LLC to Nautilus Inc., with Jeffrey E. Epstein identified as the sole beneficial owner and President of Nautilus Inc.

persons.name: Steve
persons.context: Addressed in an email requesting property deed records for Little St James Island from the period 2002-2005.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.role: Sole beneficial owner and President of Nautilus Inc.
persons.context: Identified as the sole beneficial owner and President of Nautilus Inc., the entity that received the deed for Little St James Island in 2011.

connections.description: Steve is requested to pull property deed records related to Epstein's ownership of Little St James Island.

events.title: Deed Transfer of Little St James Island
events.description: The last deed of record for Little St James Island shows a transfer from L.S.I. LLC to Nautilus Inc.

events.title: Email Request for Property Deed Records
events.description: An email is sent requesting property deed records for Little St James Island from the period 2002-2005.

keyFacts: The last recorded deed for Little St James Island is dated December 23, 2011, transferring ownership from L.S.I. LLC to Nautilus Inc.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the sole beneficial owner and President of Nautilus Inc.
An email from August 7, 2019, requests property deed records for the island from the period 2002-2005, indicating investigative interest in the property's ownership history.
